name: places/ChIJT1NwtlVYwokRIk-G2MnwqYA
adrFormatAddress: 1551 1555 Broadway, New York, NY 10036, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain selling trendy casualwear, shoes, accessories & loungewear for guys & girls.

originalText.text:
Fantastic store..

If you have purchased and used American eagle before then you will definitely visit this outlet.

Their apparels are good, trendy and  affordable.

They have a wide variety of products to offer and also has great offers at time.

Staff were friendly and approachable.

Overall, a good place to shop and very conveniently located too right at the time square.

originalText.text: Ideal location to come shopping. Sure you are a fan of American Eagle and there are thousands all over America But have you shopped at the times-square location.

text.text: Ideal location to come shopping. Sure you are a fan of American Eagle and there are thousands all over America But have you shopped at the times-square location.

originalText.text:
The staff are largely friendly and there is a large variety in the store. What I don't understand is why they have registers in the lower level (where the men's wear is) if they're just going to send people upstairs to pay.

The register downstairs was staffed, but even though there was someone working behind the register they weren't checking people out. I honestly don't get it.

Nothing against the brand but I just don't see myself shopping at this store in the future.

originalText.text:
A Fashion Oasis in the Heart of Times Square: American Eagle Store Review :)

Located amidst the vibrant hustle and bustle of Times Square, the American Eagle Store stands as a fashion oasis, offering a delightful shopping experience for trend-savvy individuals. With its impressive range of stylish clothing, attentive service, and inviting ambiance, this store deserves its place among the must-visit destinations in New York City.

Stepping inside the American Eagle Store, one is immediately struck by the sleek and modern design. The spacious layout allows customers to navigate effortlessly between the well-organized displays, making it easy to find the latest fashion essentials. The store's bright lighting accentuates the clothing's vibrant colors, while the contemporary decor adds a touch of sophistication to the overall ambiance.

The selection of clothing at American Eagle is extensive, catering to both men and women seeking trendy and comfortable attire. From classic jeans and cozy sweaters to fashionable dresses and accessories, the store offers something for everyone. Their commitment to quality is evident in the meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail found in each garment.

What truly sets American Eagle apart is their dedication to inclusivity and body positivity. Their range of sizes and styles ensures that customers of all shapes and sizes can find clothing that makes them feel confident and stylish. This commitment to diversity extends to their helpful and friendly staff, who provide personalized assistance and fashion advice, ensuring that every shopper's needs are met.

American Eagle's commitment to sustainability is commendable as well. The store promotes eco-friendly practices, offering a range of sustainable clothing options made from recycled materials. This emphasis on sustainability aligns with the growing concerns for the environment, making it an ideal choice for conscientious shoppers.

Furthermore, the checkout process at American Eagle is efficient and streamlined, ensuring a hassle-free experience. The store accepts various payment methods, including contactless options, adding convenience to the overall shopping journey.

In conclusion, the American Eagle Store in Times Square truly stands out as a fashion-forward haven in the heart of New York City. With its stylish and diverse clothing selection, attentive service, and commitment to sustainability, it exceeds expectations. Whether you're a fashion enthusiast or simply looking for quality clothing that embraces your unique style, this store offers an exceptional shopping experience that is both enjoyable and memorable.
